grouping_examples.description: Same style & fabric, different pattern = grouped. 'Kids is an exception to the standards outlined above.'
Denim washes are all very different; therefore, all denim should be separate item pages, despite being the same style & fabric.

summary: The document outlines grouping standards for apparel, detailing how items should be categorized based on style, fabric, and pattern. Special exceptions for kids' apparel and separate categorization for different denim washes are emphasized.
